item.description:
Join me to drool over Robert Downey Jr. and Jude Law in the new Sherlock Holmes movie at Showcase Cinemas Lawrence  then enjoy some dinner at China Bloosom on Christmas Day. 

The movie schedule came out today so we have selected the 1:10 showing.  The movie is 129 minutes long so dinner reservations are 4:15 to allow for travel.

Movie:http://www.moviefone.com/movie/sherlock-holmes-a-game-of-shadows/51580/synopsis

Restaurant:  http://www.chinablossom.com/

For those that wish to participate we are doing a $5 Yankee Swap as well.

I will send out my cell # day before event.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in Lobby of Movie Theater
item.name: Christmas Day Movie and Chinese Food/Yankee Swap
